title: Pinging Items In Shop?
body:
For some reason alt+left click isn’t pinging items in my shop, I recently changed settings in my hotkeys but then I just reseted it to default to try to fix the problem but it still doesn’t work!

Please help!

replies.body:
You can't ping while in the shop

You have to press G (or whatever your standard ping button is) and then open shop (default key is P) then click the item
I've always just alt-clicked items to ping them (in the store). Still can so not sure what the problem is on OPs end.
Do you know if there’s a keybinding for pinging in shop?
As far as I know, alt-click *is* the keybind for it. What DarkShade suggested works as an alternative.
I have always been able to do this idk why its not working on your end sorry

To be honest the only thing I can think that might work if resetting to default doesn't would be a clean reinstall (download the hextech repair tool, select clean reinstall and follow the prompts).

It's a bit of a disproportionate solution, but depending on how annoying you find the issue it may be worthwhile.
